      • addPositions

        boolean addPositions(java.util.List<Content.ContentType> contentTypes,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> multipleData,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> positionNames)
                     throws ContentPersistenceException
        Adds multiple positions to multiple content data. The order of both is important (same order)
        Parameters:
        contentTypes - content types
        multipleData - content data
        positionNames - position names
        Returns:
        true, if the operation was successful, false if it failed
        Throws:
        ContentPersistenceException - error while accessing to the persistence file

                         java.lang.String data)

      • updateContent

        boolean updateContent(Content.ContentType oldContentType,
                    java.lang.String oldData,
                    Content.ContentType newContentType,
                    java.lang.String newData)
                      throws ContentPersistenceException,
                             ContentSameDataException,
                             ContentAlreadyExistsException
        Updates the type and the data of an existing content.
        Parameters:
        oldContentType - content type which will be changed
        oldData - content data which will be changed
        newContentType - new content type
        newData - new content data
        Returns:
        true, if the operation was successful, false if it failed
        Throws:
        ContentPersistenceException - error while accessing to the persistence file
        ContentSameDataException - new and old data are same
        ContentAlreadyExistsException - a content with the same new type and data is already existent

      • removeAllContent

        void removeAllContent()
                      throws ContentPersistenceException
        Removes all contents
        Throws:
        ContentPersistenceException - error while accessing to the persistence file

      • removeAllPositions

        void removeAllPositions()
                        throws ContentPersistenceException
        Remove all conncted positions of every content element
        Throws:
        ContentPersistenceException - error while accessing to the persistence file
